product_description: Protect your vehicle's interior surfaces from harmful elements and damaging oxidation with Armor All Protectant Spray. Safe for vinyl, rubber and plastic, this car cleaning spray provides UVA and UVB sun protection to help prevent cracking, fading, discoloration and premature aging. It also easily removes dirt, dust and debris, leaving vehicle surfaces looking clean. Ideal for car enthusiasts and commuters, the car protectant formula restores shine and color, giving surfaces a renewed look with a medium shine and no greasy residue. To use, spray this car cleaner spray onto a clean cloth, spread evenly over the surface to be cleaned, and wipe off excess. Armor All Protectant Spray is not for use on floors, vehicle controls or any other surfaces where slipperiness could cause a hazard. Whether you're prepping your classic car for the next big show or cleaning up your daily vehicle, this protectant spray is a must-have in your car care products. In addition to protectant spray, Armor All makes glass cleaner and other products to help make your car interior cleaner. Give your vehicle the finish it deserves with Armor All.

name: Chemical Guys Heavy Duty Water Spot Remover Gel for Paint, Glass, and Metal - Mineral and Water Spot Remover for Cars, Trucks, Motorcycles, RVs & More - 16 oz
short_description: HEAVY DUTY WATER STAIN REMOVER FOR CARS(SPI10816) – Trusted by detailers for years, this gel formula targets stubborn mineral stains and water spots on paint, glass, and metal surfaces
SAFE AND EFFECTIVE FORMULA – This car water spot remover is designed to remove tough water marks without damaging clear coat, polished metal, or glass, making it safe for regular detailing use

VERSATILE SURFACE APPLICATION – A hard water stain remover that works on painted panels, chrome trim, aluminum, stainless steel, and exterior glass for a complete water spot removal solution; a great addition to you car detailing kit

EASY TO USE GEL – Thick formula of this Chemical Guys water spot remover clings to vertical surfaces for longer working time; simply apply, rub gently, and rinse or wipe away for a clean, spot-free finish

PREPARES SURFACES FOR PROTECTION – Chemical Guys hard water spot remover removes grime and light debris that can block waxes or sealants from bonding properly, ensuring better protection and longer-lasting shine
BEYOND AUTOMOTIVE USES – Ideal for boats, RVs, and household glass or metal surfaces; this hard water stain remover for glass safely removes mineral deposits and spots from a variety of finishes
product_description: Chemical Guys Heavy Duty Water Spot Remover (SPI10816) is a professional-grade gel designed to tackle one of the most stubborn detailing challenges—hard water stains and etched mineral deposits. Whether caused by sprinkler systems, rain, or contaminated rinse water, these spots can leave unsightly marks on paint, glass, and metal that traditional washing alone cannot remove. This powerful gel restores clarity and shine while helping to protect your investment. The advanced gel formula clings to vertical panels, glass, and trim for longer working time, allowing the active ingredients to safely break down tough mineral buildup. Unlike harsh abrasives, this water spot remover for glass gently lifts away deposits without scratching or damaging delicate finishes. It is safe for use on clear coat, polished metals, chrome trim, and exterior glass, making it versatile enough for a wide range of detailing tasks. By removing water spots effectively, this hard water spot remover for cars also prepares surfaces for waxes, sealants, and ceramic coatings, ensuring better adhesion and longer-lasting protection. Regular use after spotting can help prevent permanent etching, keeping your surfaces smooth, reflective, and ready for protective layers. The result is a flawless, spot-free shine that enhances both appearance and durability. Ideal for cars, trucks, motorcycles, RVs, and boats, Heavy Duty Water Spot Remover is trusted by detailers and enthusiasts who want a reliable solution for tough mineral stains. Simply apply to a microfiber applicator, work into the affected area, and wipe clean to reveal restored surfaces. Bring back the brilliance of your ride and enjoy a cleaner, more polished finish every time you detail. This gel is great for vehicle owners to use during their routine auto detailing and vehicle maintenance to remove water spots.

SURFACE-FRIENDLY FORMULA: This car interior cleaner is gentle on leather, vinyl, plastic, and rubber while lifting buildup. Clean steering wheels, glove boxes, and upholstery with no residue or scratches.

REUSABLE AND ECONOMICAL: Use this detailing gel multiple times—break off, clean until the color shifts, and reuse. Store in a cool place below 80° to maintain texture, as high heat can cause it to come apart.
